NavigationHistoryEntryGetState.summary: The getState() method of the interface returns a clone of the developer-supplied state associated with this history entry.

remarks.para:
-Modern client-side routing: the Navigation API
-Navigation API explainer
-Domenic Denicola's Navigation API live demo

NavigationHistoryEntryGetState.returns: A value representing the state. This can be any structured-cloneable data type.If no state is defined or if current document is not fully active, it returns undefined.
